General.Name: Northann Corp.
General.Description: Northann Corp. engages in the manufacture, wholesale, and retail of the 3D printed vinyl flooring panels and other decorative panels in North America, Europe, and internationally. It offers its products under the Benchwick and Dotfloor brand names. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Elk Grove, California.
General.Address: 9820 Dino Drive, Elk Grove, CA, United States, 95624
